title: Pond Adventures with Aragon
description: Follow Aragon, the deer, his family and his friends, Luther, Chippy and Mister Big, as they discover the surprise the lady left for them and experience a day of adventure near the pond. Includes fun facts about white-tailed deer. The colorful, original oil and computer images from Scottish artist, John Morris, help bring Aragon and his friends to life. This is the second book in the Pond Adventures series. Also check out Pond Adventures with Chippy and Mud Pies.
author: Cindy Freland
